Movie Club

Alien (1979)

Based on a story by O'Bannon and Ronald Shusett, Alien is a story of a spaceship crew that must struggle against a creature known as the Xenomorph for there individual survival.

Posted by Max Powers on July 26, 2022

Jurassic Park (1993)

Jurassic Park is about a select group chosen to tour an island theme park populated by dinosaurs created from prehistoric DNA.

Posted by Max Powers on July 31, 2022

Raiders of the Lost Ark

We rejoin Indana Jones on another crazy adventure but this time he fights a band of Nazis to recover yet another priceless artifact from falling into the wrong hands.

Posted by Max Powers on August 8, 2022
